name: Chickpeas
properties: Part of Daily Dozen - 3 servings of legumes daily
Different impact on microbiome than animal protein
benefits: One hundred calories of chickpeas have a different impact than one hundred calories of chicken or chocolate, based on their different effects on such factors as absorption, appetite or our microbiome. Benefits excess body weight, insulin resistance, and inflammation.
